name: cubit and the evil gameshow host

description:
cubit must face a evil gameshow host!

sound design and music by https://itch.io/profile/qtp2t

HOW IT WORKS:

go through a tough platforming sequence before answering a question on the gameshow depending on the things that were in the platforming sequence
